title: Privilege
beginning: Draw 1
middle: Take 1 gold
end: Use the lowest rank dungeon plot

title: Conscript a hostage
beginning: Use the lowest rank dungeon plot
middle: Take it's time in gold
end: If it is red, take 1 gold

title: Disguise as a peasant
beginning: Take 1 gold
middle: If there is no lower rank played plot, use your top discard plot

title: Found a charity
beginning: If you have 5 or less gold, take 5 gold
middle: Take 1 gold for each lower rank played plot
end: Take the highest rank played plot's time in gold

title: Hire a mercenary
beginning: If there is another red played plot, pay 1 gold
middle: Use the lowest rank played plot other than this
end: If it is red, use the second lowest rank played plot other than this

title: Revolutionize court fashion
beginning: Draw 1
middle: If the left timeline plot is green, use it

title: Give your daughter in marriage
beginning: Pay 1 gold
middle: If the left 2 timeline plots are the same color, use them in order
end: Otherwise, take their total time in gold

title: Smite the Chamberlain
beginning: If your top discard plot is green, imprison it
middle: If the left timeline plot is yellow, use it
end: Otherwise, use the highest rank plot in the dungeon

title: Advocate reform
beginning: If you have 5 or less gold, draw 1
middle: If you have 5 or less plots in hand, take 1 gold
end: If the highest rank played plot is yellow, pay 1 gold

title: Receive prophesy
beginning: If you have 5 or les plots in hand, draw 1
middle: Look at the top plot in your deck, then put it back
end: Put 1 plot from your hand face down on your deck

title: Give fealty
beginning: Pay the left timeline plot's time in gold
middle: Draw that many

title: Smuggle contraband
beginning: Put your top discard plot face down on your deck
middle: Take 1 gold for each plot in the timeline

title: Rob the wretched
beginning: Use the lowest rank dungeon plot
middle: Take its rank in gold

title: Impersonate a foreign Countess
beginning: Take the highest time dungeon plot's time in gold
middle: If the left timeline plot is a different color, draw 2

title: Steal from the rich and give to the poor
beginning: Take 1 gold for every yellow timeline plot
middle: If there is a lower rank played plot, pay 1 gold

title: Kidnap the Judge
beginning: Use the lowest rank green dungeon plot
middle: If your top discard plot is red, take 1 gold

title: Rule alongside your daughter
beginning: If your top discard plot is green, draw 1
middle: If the left timeline plot is green, revive 1

title: Evict the tenants
beginning: If your top discard plot is yellow, use it
middle: Otherwise, imprison it

title: Jailbreak
beginning: Use the highest rank green dungeon plot
middle: Use the highest rank yellow dungeon plot

title: Secretly author plays
beginning: Draw 1 for each green plot in the timeline
middle: Take the highest played time in gold

title: Learn ancient alchemy
beginning: Take your top discard plot's rank in gold
middle: If it is green or red, appoint it

title: Challenge to a duel
beginning: Use the lowest rank red timeline plot
middle: If there is a higher rank red timeline plot, take the lower rank in gold

title: Reclaim your rights
beginning: If your top discard plot is green, use it
middle: Revive 1 for each green timeline plot

title: Hold a market fair
beginning: If the left and second left timeline plots are different colors, draw 2
middle: If the left and right timeline plots are different colors, take 2 gold

title: Buccaneer a treasure ship
beginning: Use the lowest rank yellow played plot
middle: If there is no yellow played plot, use the lowest rank yellow dungeon plot

title: Mask the Crown Princess
beginning: If you have 5 or more discard plots, imprison your top discard plot
middle: Revive your entire discard

title: Steal the diamond
beginning: If your deck or discard is empty, take 5 gold
middle: Otherwise, appoint your entire hand

title: Appoint a Sheriff
beginning: If you have 10 or less gold, use the highest rank dungeon plot
middle: Take 1 gold for each unique lower rank dungeon plot

title: Bribe the Judge
beginning: If the left timeline plot is yellow, pay 1 gold
middle: Revive 1 for each unique green dungeon plot

title: Embezzle funds
beginning: If your top discard plot is yellow, take 5 gold
middle: Revive 1 for each unique yellow dungeon plot

title: Torture the spymaster
beginning: Use the highest rank dungeon plot
middle: Revive as many as it has time

title: Excommunicate the Cardinal
beginning: If your top discard plot is red or yellow, imprison it
middle: If 1 of the 2 left timeline plots are green, but not both, revive 4

title: Declare bankruptcy
beginning: Take 1 gold for each yellow plot in your deck
middle: Appoint your entire deck

title: Dub a Dame in shining armor
beginning: Use your top discard plot
middle: Revive 1 for each red plot in the timeline

title: Promise a title
beginning: If you have 5 or more plots in your deck, appoint your top deck plot
middle: Draw your entire deck

title: Control the guilds
beginning: If your top discard plot is yellow, use it
middle: Take 5 gold for each same color plot at the left of the timeline

title: Start a riot
beginning: If your top discard plot is green or yellow, appoint it
middle: Use the lowest rank plot in the timeline next to a green plot

title: Become the Queen of Thieves
beginning: Use the highest ranked green plot in the timeline
middle: Revive 1 for each unique plot in the dungeon

title: Collect rents
beginning: Take 1 gold for each played plot rank 10 or lower
middle: Draw 1 for each unique plot in the dungeon

title: Plunder the treasury
beginning: Use the highest rank yellow plot
middle: Take 2 gold for each yellow plot in the timeline

title: Court the Duchess
beginning: If you have 5 or more plots in your hand, appoint your top deck plot
middle: Use the left timeline plot twice

title: Confiscate estates
beginning: If you have 5 or more plots in your hand, imprison your top discard plot
middle: Take 2 gold for each unique plot in the dungeon

title: Organize a mutiny
beginning: Use the highest rank played plot other than this
middle: If it is red, draw 4

title: Move the capital
beginning: If your top discard plot is red or yellow, appoint it
middle: Draw 5

title: Issue bonds
beginning: Take the left timeline plot's rank in gold
middle: If there is a red played plot, pay 10 gold

title: Declare martial law
beginning: If the highest rank played plot is green, use it
middle: Otherwise, use the left timeline plot

title: Choose the next Pope
beginning: Pay 30 gold
middle: Revive until you have 10 plots in hand

title: Blackmail her Majesty
beginning: Take the highest rank dungeon plot's rank in gold
middle: Take your top discard plot's rank in gold

title: Streetfight
beginning: Use your top discard plot
middle: Take 10 times it's time in gold

title: Enclose peasant land
beginning: If the left timeline plot is green, pay 1 gold
middle: Draw your entire deck

title: Invest a Bishop
beginning: Take 30 gold for each played plot rank 30 or above
middle: Revive your entire discard

title: Declare independence
beginning: Take 10 times as much gold as you have
middle: Use the highest rank green or yellow played plot
